title: Importance of Sleep for Health
content: Sleep is the best insurance policy for lifespan and healthspan. It is a life support system and perhaps Mother Nature’s best effort yet at immortality. Sleep acts like a superordinate node in the biological equation of health. If you optimize sleep, you’re doing as much as probably you can from the health regard standpoint in terms of increasing your insurance for a longer life.

title: Sleep and Healthspan
content: There is a good chance healthspan increases along with lifespan with better sleep. Studies are being planned to look at health span, not just lifespan.

title: Economic Benefits of Better Sleep
content: Better sleep could result in a huge cost benefit equation. The relief of health care burden that would happen if we could live longer, healthier by way of sleep could result in enormous cost savings. Unfortunately, as a country, we are not motivating/incentivizing our societies to get better sleep.
